Texts.Eng: For now, you are free to roam the galaxy as you will. Once I have more details to share with you, I will contact you again. Good luck out there, ambassador, and be careful.
I will meet with the other leaders of the Alliance soon, so we can discuss this tragedy in full. We will also discuss what your next assignment will be.

It is good to see that you are well, ambassador. I learned about the destruction of Earth and the Protectorate through some of the other ambassadors who escaped, and I had feared you might have perished in the chaos.
